N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 18 ยง 628.2 - Conditions for reimbursement for foster care

State Regulations
(a) No portion of any claim for reimbursement
may be supported solely with State funds if reimbursement may be claimed from a
program for which there is Federal participation. (b) Any claims for reimbursement from a
program or activity for which there is Federal participation which were not
fully reimbursed as claimed and which were properly made at the time they were
originally submitted to the department may be claimed as child care services
for which Federal financial participation may be claimed as foster care and
adoption assistance pursuant to title IV-E of the Social Security Act or aid to
families with dependent children (AFDC) or other expenditures for which such
participation is available if they could have been so claimed when originally
submitted, provided that the revised claim is timely and that an adjustment
made to reduce the original claim is simultaneously submitted to the
department. (c) Any claims for
reimbursement made from a program or activity for which there is Federal
participation which were not reimbursed and which were properly made at the
time they were submitted to the department may be claimed as if Federal
participation was not available if the claims were appropriate at the time they
were originally submitted, provided that the revised claim is timely and that
an adjustment is simultaneously submitted to the department to reduce the
original claim. (d) Claims for
reimbursement for child care services expenditures shall not be submitted if
such claims seek reimbursement at rates or amounts that are greater than
otherwise permitted by the department in accordance with section
398-a
or
432
of the

Social Services Law or by provisions of any other law or regulation. (e) Any claims for reimbursement for child
care services expenditures which are subsequently determined by the department
to be reimbursable from another program for which Federal participation is
available and for which a higher proportion of Federal participation could be
received shall be reduced in an amount equivalent to the amount determined by
the department to be due as a result of the availability of additional Federal
participation. (f) Any adjustments
to claims for reimbursement, including adjustments to claims as a result of
recoveries or collections, shall be made in accordance with procedures, instructions or directions of the department. Notes
